message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be a great fit for your needs. Our initial offer for this exceptional item is $500000. We're confident in its value and hope you'll see its worth. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $400000. I'm confident that's a fair price for this product.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your perspective and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. To better align with both our interests, we propose a revised price of $450000 for the product. This offer reflects a compromise while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us. We look forward to your consideration.
I appreciate the revised offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $425000. I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us.

Thank you for your continued engagement, Bob. We've carefully considered your latest proposal and are pleased to offer $437500 for the product. This price reflects a balance between our interests and aims to provide a fair return for us while remaining competitive in the market. We hope this proposal meets your expectations and facilitates a successful transaction.
I appreciate the latest offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $427500. I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us, and I'm getting close to my target.

Thank you for your patience and understanding, Bob. We've reviewed your most recent offer and are willing to consider $430000 for the product. This price acknowledges your concerns while also maintaining a reasonable profit margin for us. We believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution.
I appreciate the latest offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $428000. I'm trying to find a price that works for both of us, and I'm not far off from my target now.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Bob. We've taken your latest offer into consideration and are prepared to offer $429500 for the product. We believe this price strikes a good balance between our interests and respects the value of the product. We hope this proposal will lead to a successful conclusion of our discussions.
I appreciate all the back and forth, Alice. I'm willing to make a final offer of $429000. If that's not acceptable, I'll have to consider other options.
